text:
e="preserve">Eldon A. Money (November 7, 1930 – July 8, 2020) was an American politician. He was a Democratic member of the Utah House of Representatives and Utah State Senate. An alumnus of Utah State University, he was a farmer and cattleman. He was a state representative from 1974 to 1979 and he was a state senator from 1980 to 1997. He was born in Spanish Fork, Utah.
He died of Alzheimer's disease on July 8, 2020, in Mapleton, Utah at age 89.
